name: HH_INTVTN_DISC_GROUP
description: This table stores the related multi discipline group info.

columns.name: INTERVENTION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the intervention record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: DISCIPLINE_GROUP_ID
columns.description: The discipline group (LDS) set over time associated with home health disciplines (SER) on care plan intervention.

columns.name: DISCIPLINE_GROUP_ID_DISC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the discipline record.
